bug.summary: CVAT new UI: display of cuboids
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>My actions before raising this issue</denchmark-h>
Read/searched the docs Searched past issues
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behaviour</denchmark-h>
The look of Cuboid makes editing clear and convenient. <denchmark-h:h3>Current Behaviour</denchmark-h>
If “occluded” is turned on, cuboid points have a dashed line, and projection lines also become dashed <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/54434686/81203305-79f09180-8fd0-11ea-94a5-7d87566fcee0.png></denchmark-link>
Cuboid planes do not change the fill on hover (unlike the old interface) <denchmark-h:h3>Possible Solution</denchmark-h>
When turned on, the “occluded” projection lines and the stroke of the points do not become dashed. Cuboid planes on hover become highlighted (like in the old UI) <denchmark-h:h3>Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)</denchmark-h>
